scripts.deploy-cloud: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file cloud/template.yml --profile uni-connector --stack-name uni-connector-stack --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
scripts.postinstall: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.start: concurrently "docker-compose up" "cd backend && npm run client:start" "cd frontend && PORT=3001 npm start"
